Package Server

Class AReservationDBController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.AReservationDBController
  • public abstract class AReservationDBController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class make the functionality for the server that includes a connection to the DB. The Focus of this class is on functions that deal with 'Reservations'

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AReservationDBController()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static ObjectMessage alreadyReserveBook​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function check if reader account doesnt have reserve for book
      private static ObjectMessage cancelReservation​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function cancel reservation for spesific book and spesific reader account if have somone next in the queue let the next person implement
      private static ObjectMessage deleteAllReservations​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function triggerd when somone lost his book and it was the last copy of this book the function delete all the reservations for book and notify all the people who had reservation for this book.
      private static ObjectMessage getReaderThatCanImplement​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function check if have somone that can implement reservation for book
      private static ObjectMessage getReserves​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function returns the list of reservation of the reader account
      private static ObjectMessage implementReserveBook​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      this method implement reservation it recieve reader account and reservation it check if we can to borrow the copy and consider the queue of reservation for each book the practical borrow progress in the method implementTheBorrow
      private static ObjectMessage implementTheBorrow​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function makes the borrow implementation
      private static ObjectMessage letImplementReservation​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function let the next readerAccount implement his resrvation start the time of 48 hours and notify him about it
      private static ObjectMessage reserveBook​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function let readerAccount reserve a book if doesnt have reserve for book also check that all the copies of the book is borrowed and the readerAccount is active
      static ObjectMessage selection​(ObjectMessage msg, java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
      This function sorts the request in the 'msg' to the relevant function and returns the answer

        connToSQL - - the connection to the MySQL created in the Class OBLServer
        Returns:
        ObjectMessage with the answer to the client

                                                  java.sql.Connection connToSQL)

      • reserveBook

        private static ObjectMessage reserveBook​(ObjectMessage msg,
                                         java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
        This function let readerAccount reserve a book if doesnt have reserve for book also check that all the copies of the book is borrowed and the readerAccount is active

      • deleteAllReservations

        private static ObjectMessage deleteAllReservations​(ObjectMessage msg,
                                                   java.sql.Connection connToSQL)
        This function triggerd when somone lost his book and it was the last copy of this book the function delete all the reservations for book and notify all the people who had reservation for this book.
